actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow certain heat pumps to be treated as renewable energy source property for purposes of the residential energy credit.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow expenditures for certain heat pumps to qualify for the residential energy income tax credit.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow certain heat pumps to be treated as renewable energy source property for purposes of the residential energy credit.
